name: Sarah
message: Kya...tsu！

name: Sarah
message: Who......who are you？

name: Male voice
message: Hehehe.....

name: Male voice
message: Struggle as much as you want.
You　can't　escape　from　those　shackles　anyway......

name: Sarah
message: Why... why would you do something so awful？

name: Male voice
message: That's a dumb question. I do it because it's messed up. Now then‥‥‥‥

name: Sarah
message: Ah... ah！ Not there！

name: Male voice
message: Hmm, you still haven't even grown all your hair yet, huh.
This is useless like this.

name: Sarah
message: Ah, ah, ah... *hic*... *sniffle*... *sob*......

name: Male voice
message: I'll make sure to enjoy myself as much as I can.
That's all you're worth........

name: Sarah
message: P-please... don't... do anything cruel...

name: Male voice
message: Are you scared？
Interesting, keep entertaining me like that.

name: Sarah
message: Stop... forgive me... please...

name: Male voice
message: Here we go... Let me hear you scream...

name: Sarah
message: Ah, fu-kku... iiiiaaaaah！

name: Sarah
message: Ow...... it hurts...... I'm gonna die......

name: Male voice
message: 血か、処女だったようだな。貴様ら女はいくら若かろうが　　　　　　得体が知れん化け物だからな。襞すら見えんその口で男を　　　　　　咥えこんでいるお前がいい例だ。

name: Sarah
message: ひどい‥‥‥‥ひどいよぉ‥‥‥‥

name: Male voice
message: そうか？　その内腰を振って悦びだすさ。女は、そういう　　　　　　生き物なのだ。

name: Sarah
message: ぐっ‥‥や‥‥やだっ‥‥う‥‥あ！　んあ！

name: Male voice
message: Oh? So you're already starting to feel it. Even though you don't even have the bare minimum functions as a living being, you can still feel pleasure like a grown adult? Greedy beast！

name: Sarah
message: What... is this... ahh！

name: Sarah
message: My body... my body's so hot...

name: Male voice
message: Heh heh heh... Pathetic... Truly pathetic！

name: Sarah
message: Wh-what's... gonna happen to me...

name: Sarah
message: Help me... Lushion... Help me！

name: Male voice
message: Hmph... She's the same. You’ve kinda figured it out yourself, right？ The past she’s been desperately hiding from you...

name: Sarah
message: No... stop...

name: Male voice
message: Just what kind of ugly beast is lurking under that composed mask！

name: Sarah
message: ...Don't defile Lushion-sama...！

name: Male voice
message: That woman too... is having her breasts groped by a man like this...

name: Sarah
message: ...kuuuu...auh...

name: Male voice
message: This ugly organ was toyed with... and I went crazy with pleasure.

name: Sarah
message: No...no way！ Uwaaah！

name: Male voice
message: For a kid who hasn't even had her first period yet, you're pretty damn sensitive... I bet that woman spoils you every night, huh.

name: Sarah
message: Wh-what are you doing！ I won't forgive you...

name: Male voice
message: Looks like you still don't get your position！

name: Sarah
message: ぐっ‥‥‥あ、ああっ！　苦し‥‥‥うあっ！

name: Sarah
message: N-no, stop！

name: Male voice
message: You're squeezing me really tight......

name: Sarah
message: It hurts... it hurts... I'm gonna die...

name: Sarah
message: Aaahhh... nnngh, I can't take it anymore...！

name: Male voice
message: I'm gonna pour it all in, nice and deep.

name: Male voice
message: The seed of my... 'Pactmaker', you know.

name: Sarah
message: What the hell... this kind of thing... I don't get it...

name: Sarah
message: Aaahhh...my body's...so hot！

name: Male voice
message: It’d be interesting if you ended up getting pregnant with my kid.　　　　　　If that happens, well, that just means more fun for me.

name: Sarah
message: What are you doing... Stop... Please, have mercy！

name: Male voice
message: All right, I'll give it to you！

name: Sarah
message: ...Ah...Lushion-samaaa！

name: Lushion
message: Sarah......Sarah......

name: Lushion
message: Wake up.

name: Sarah
message: Ah...... Lushion-sama......

name: Lushion
message: You were having a really bad nightmare.
Did you have a bad dream or something？

name: Lushion
message: What's wrong？ You're still half-asleep, huh. You're all sweaty like this......

name: Lushion
message: At times like this, you shouldn't force yourself to talk.
It must've been a really scary dream, that's the first time I've ever seen you tossing and turning like that.

name: Sarah
message: Have you been by my side all this time......？

name: Lushion
message: You weren't looking so good.

name: Sarah
message: Lushion... I'm so pathetic...
I keep just getting in the way... and on top of that...

name: Lushion
message: You’re going to grow from here on out.
That's why I'm here as your guardian.
There's nothing you need to worry about.

name: Sarah
message: Thank you so much...... Lushion-sama......

name: Lushion
message: ......You can come in.
She's already calmed down now.

name: Nun
message: Ah... I didn't mean to eavesdrop.

name: Lushion
message: You seemed to be hesitating at the doorway for quite a while.

name: Nun
message: Um, I've come as a messenger from Sister Maria......

name: Lushion
message: Sister Maria's errand？

name: Lushion
message: I wonder what they're here for. Do you know？

name: Nun
message: I don't know...... I was just ordered to call you, that's all.

name: Lushion
message: Yeah, got it.
Please tell them I'll be right over.

name: Nun
message: If you don't come with me, I'll get scolded.

name: Lushion
message: Got it, I don't like seeing you get scolded either, you know. Especially if it's because of me.

name: Nun
message: I'm terribly sorry.........

name: Sarah
message: Lady Lushion......

name: Lushion
message: Don't worry, I'll be back by tomorrow morning, so go ahead and sleep first.

name: Sarah
message: Are you really going to be okay？

name: Lushion
message: Yeah, I'll be fine.
Are you sure you won't be having those bad dreams again？

name: Sarah
message: I'm... fine now.

name: Lushion
message: I see, that's good to hear.
Shall we go? It'd be rude to keep the Sister waiting.
It looks like Lushion still hasn't come back even by the next morning.
The bed is completely empty, with no sign that she ever slept there.

name: Sarah
message: "Lushion... what on earth happened..."
There's no doubt that something happened to Lushion.
A vision of the nun's corpse abandoned in the snow comes to mind......
Is she going to end up the same way？

name: Sarah
message: <I have to help... Lushion-sama is in danger>

name: Sarah
message: 《But...how？》

name: Sarah
message: "I wonder if I can really do something like that..."

name: Sarah
message: "Nuh-uh, I gotta do it."
『Hey, have you heard yet？』
『I heard about it, right? This time it's someone named Lushion who disappeared, isn't it?』
『It's not even been a week since I got here, y'know.』
『でもあの人、枢機卿の下で働く密偵だったって話じゃない。』
『Well, I guess it can't be helped then.....』
『I really thought that person would save this place for us.』
『Isn't it already impossible？』
『あたし達なんて、この院を出ても行く所がないしねぇ‥‥‥』
『All you can do is cover your ears and wait for the misfortune to pass over your head.』
『Speaking of covering your ears...』
『What is it？』
『Last night, they said they heard screams and what sounded like a beast growling again.』
『Again？ It's from the Cathedral, right...』
『I still think there's something under there, you know.』
『Cut it out, there’s no point in us poking our noses into that.” 『Yeah, I’d hate it if my turn came up any sooner because of it...』

name: Sarah
message: 《大聖堂の地下‥‥‥‥》

name: Sarah
message: 《Let's go.》

name: Sarah
message: <Lushion-sama, please be safe......>
It's past midnight.
Candlelight and moonlight illuminate the area.
Sarah hides in the shadows, quietly watching for hours.
And, perhaps because of her effort, she spotted some men coming out from the stairs leading underground.

name: Sarah
message: (Those people... they're not from the monastery.)

name: Sarah
message: (Why are they coming from a place like that？)

name: Sarah
message: (And... what's with that baggage？)

name: Sarah
message: (I have no choice but to check it out...)

name: Sarah
message: (Light is leaking out...)

name: Male voice
message: Why are you whining about it now?！ The cardinal's spy, you say?

name: Male voice
message: So what？ That matter should already be settled！

name: Male voice
message: Ugh, enough already. We don't need cowards-just pack your baggage and go back to your cousin's place.

name: Sarah
message: (It's from that room...)

name: Sarah
message: (Somehow, that voice sounds familiar...)

name: Sarah
message: (No way...！ Oh, God！)

name: Sarah
message: (Please, protect your servant...)

name: Sarah
message: (The person sitting in that chair-his name is Pietro.)

name: Sarah
message: (Why is someone who does chores at the monastery here？)

name: Sarah
message: <<And... the one next to me is the priest who was conducting the mass.>>

name: Sarah
message: 《What am I doing in a place like this？》

name: Pietro
message: Nai, are you really the 'last one left'？
Aren't you completely useless?

name: Nai
message: You can take it out on me all you want. But the fact is, unless all the prey line up, my master will never wake from their slumber‥‥‥‥

name: Pietro
message: Seriously... what a gluttonous god！ Eating up every single life that could be used as sustenance, then falling asleep afterwards.

name: Nai
message: He was battered and exhausted from the fighting. But the day of his revival isn't far off.

name: Pietro
message: I hope so. I’ve had enough of this life where we can’t ever show our faces outside.

name: Nai
message: For that, we need 'those who become sustenance.' And lots of them.

name: Pietro
message: That's why I'm putting in the effort like this. That monster is hard to kill,　　　but in exchange, its growth is crazy slow.

name: Pietro
message: At that rate, who knows how many hundreds of years it would take to get enough of them together. I gotta mess with things a little, or nothing's ever gonna change.

name: Nai
message: The person I served said the same thing.

name: Pietro
message: Leave it to me. As long as I've got the women here and the Necronomicon, I'll manage somehow.

name: Nai
message: It's the forbidden book created by Abdul Alhazred. The key to awakening my master is written inside......

name: Sarah
message: <Necronomicon？>

name: Sarah
message: <A forbidden book... what does that mean？>

name: Pietro
message: Maybe I'll try using that woman. She's got an especially wicked soul, maybe the results will be different than usual.

name: Nai
message: By the way, why not get rid of that woman called Angelica too？ That woman knows way too much.

name: Pietro
message: Alright, fine. Maria already does exactly what I want, I don't need Angelica.

name: Pietro
message: Well then, shall we go?

name: Sarah
message: <That woman... oh no, I have to hide！>

name: Angelica
message: Looking good, Lushion.

name: Angelica
message: I've been waiting for this day for so long. To see you crying, screaming, begging me for mercy...

name: Lushion
message: Is that so, but I have no intention of crying or begging you for mercy.

name: Lushion
message: So? Who's the man with you? Is he your new lover or something?

name: Angelica
message: Mouthy woman！

name: Pietro
message: Enough. Seems she's a spy for the cardinal, she's got some nerve.

name: Pietro
message: I like that kind of woman. I'm looking forward to finding out how long you can keep up that act.

name: Lushion
message: Oh really？ It's not like I'm here to entertain you guys.

name: Lushion
message: But you know, unlike Angelica over there, I don't go wagging my tail at just anyone.

name: Angelica
message: Excuse me, what！?

name: Pietro
message: That's just great. A timid woman wouldn't last even half an hour, you know.

name: Pietro
message: Wouldn’t it be boring if you went insane that easily？

name: Lushion
message: What did you just say...？

name: Pietro
message: When I sic that thing on them, most women lose their minds right away......... Can't blame them.

name: Pietro
message: Come out, I've got a new prey for you！

name: Pietro
message: You've never seen a creature so hideous and disgusting before, have you‥‥‥‥

name: Pietro
message: If you think about their tongues crawling all over your privates and something reeking of stench thrusting into you, honestly-it’d probably be a hell of a lot better to just go insane. That’d be a mercy.

name: Lushion
message: What are you talking about‥‥‥‥‥‥

name: Pietro
message: Don't be so impatient. He'll be here soon.

name: Lushion
message: Wha...what...is this smell...

name: Pietro
message: Looks like they've arrived. Man, this smell could almost break my nose.

name: Pietro
message: 最初は側に置いておこうかと思ったが、臭いで止めた。　　　　　　　部屋に空けた出入口をわざわざ塞いでしまったよ。

name: Pietro
message: では‥‥‥‥存分に楽しませてもらおうか。

name: Pietro
message: Go ahead, do whatever you want. But don't kill him, okay? He's not a toy.
